metadata.title: JAMSTEC Crustal Structural Database
metadata.description: Crustal structural data based on the research programs of Frontier Research Program of Subduction Dynamics (1997-2001), the first phase of IFREE (Institute for Frontier Research on Earth Evolution, 2002-2004), and the second phase of IFREE (Institute For Research on Earth Evolution, 2004-).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Crustal structural data based on the research programs of Frontier Research Program of Subduction Dynamics (1997-2001), the first phase of IFREE (Institute for Frontier Research on Earth Evolution, 2002-2004), and the second phase of IFREE (Institute For Research on Earth Evolution, 2004-).

Status: In Progress
